alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Wasco (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 5:21PM PDT until May 19 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pendleton Oregon has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Jefferson County in central Oregon... South central Wasco County in north central Oregon... * Until 615 PM PDT. * At 521 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over eastern Warm Springs Reservation, or 15 miles north of Madras, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... South Junction, Warm Springs and eastern Warm Springs Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
